full_summary:
### 5A316-224927 - Pulse CO-Oximeters

#### Notice Information

* **Publication Date**: January 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 27, 2023 - 14:00 EST
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3790369839

#### Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the supply and delivery of nineteen (19) Pulse CO-Oximeter units to the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC). The requested devices will be used at various nursing stations.

#### Terms and Conditions

* The procurement method is Competitive - Open bidding.
* The selection criterion is Lowest Price.
* Trade agreements applicable are the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The contract value is not disclosed.
* The contract start date is anticipated to be February 15, 2023.
* The contract end date is not specified.
* Delivery is expected to be made to Winnipeg.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:
* Matthew Keenan
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Phone: [Not Applicable]
* Email: <matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

Please note that all attachments are included in the official notice URL.

#### Notice URL

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15043485?extsite=MTUwNDM0ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15043485?extsite=MTUwNDM0ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
